item.title: Beef rendang
item.description: Ingredients 600 g beef chuck steak or gravy beef 1 teaspoon salt 2 teaspoons sugar 1.5 teaspoons tamarind paste 120 g desiccated coconut, toasted in a dry pan Spice paste 2 large onions 3 large jalapeno chillies 14 dried chillies (or fewer if you want it less spicy) 1 thumb sized piece of ginger 2 slices galangal (you can use dried slices - just re hydrate the slices in some hot water for 10 minutes or so) 3 fat cloves of garlic 2 tablespoons of the toasted coconut from above Curry sauce
